Producer: Monte Zajicek, Melodie Sisk, Mark L. Lester, Coleman Lannum, Ash Christian
Synopsis: Zoe Crandle's life didn't exactly turn out the way she had planned. She's facing eviction, her business is going under, and she's resigned to an existence of one-night stands. Just when it seems her whole world is unraveling, Zoe meets fellow lovable loser Paul. The pair form an instant connection, but there's just one problem -- Paul is married. With help from her best friend, Zoe soon devises a plan to save her business and salvage her love life.
Title: Social Animals
